title: Artist Profile: Arvor
body:
Sometimes we forget that photojournalism isn’t just paparazzi waiting outside hotels to catch celebrities in compromising situations.

  **Arvor** is a collective of 40 Press and Editorial graduates from **Falmouth University**. The photographs exhibited are painfully realistic  shots of poignant contemporary issues, rigorously researched, that might have otherwise escaped our attention. From uncovering a lesser-known Amish community in Ireland, to delving into the psychology of musical tribute acts, all investigations are dealt with respect, tact and elegance.

**Arvor** will be holding a summer festival to exhibit their work in Falmouth until the 23rd June.

For those who aren’t in the West Country, check out each photographers stunning portfolio on their website [HERE](http://arvor.weservesites.co.uk/).
